        xor
      • `xor`(f1, f2: XmmBinaryField): XmmBinaryField
  • Exports

This module implements binary fields with XMM register.

Imports

../../assign, ../../bitutils, ../../macros, ../../simd, ../../staticfor, ../../../core/common, ../../../core/rule

Types

XmmBinaryField = M128i
Binary field with XMM register.

func areSettledTsu(field1, field2, field3, existField: XmmBinaryField): bool {.
    inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns true if all binary fields are settled by Tsu rule. Note that this function is only slightly lighter than settleTsu. 
func areSettledWater(field1, field2, field3, existField: XmmBinaryField): bool {.
    inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns true if all binary fields are settled by Water rule. Note that this function is only slightly lighter than settleWater. 
func clear(self: var XmmBinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [],
                                       forbids: [].}
Clears the binary field. 
func crossRotate(self: var XmmBinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Rotates the binary field by 180 degrees in groups of three rows. Ghost cells are cleared before the rotation. 
func del(self: var XmmBinaryField; row: Row; col: Col; phys: Phys) {.inline,
    noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Deletes the value and shifts the binary field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the binary field downward above where deleted. If it is in the water, shifts the binary field upward below where deleted. 
func dropGarbagesTsu(self: var XmmBinaryField; counts: array[Col, int];
                     existField: XmmBinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops cells by Tsu rule. This function requires that the mask is settled and the counts are non-negative. 
func dropGarbagesWater(self, other1, other2: var XmmBinaryField;
                       counts: array[Col, int]; existField: XmmBinaryField) {.
    inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops cells by Water rule. self is shifted and is dropped garbages; other1 and other2 are only shifted. This function requires that the mask is settled and the counts are non-negative. 
func flipHorizontal(self: var XmmBinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Flips the binary field horizontally. 
func flipVertical(self: var XmmBinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Flips the binary field vertically. 
func init(T: type XmmBinaryField): T:type {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}
Returns the binary field with all elements zero. 
func initFloor(T: type XmmBinaryField): T:type {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}
Returns the binary field with floor bits one. 
func initLowerAir(T: type XmmBinaryField): T:type {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}
Returns the binary field with lower air bits one. 
func initOne(T: type XmmBinaryField): T:type {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}
Returns the binary field with all valid elements one. 
func initUpperWater(T: type XmmBinaryField): T:type {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}
Returns the binary field with upper underwater bits one. 
func insert(self: var XmmBinaryField; row: Row; col: Col; val: bool; phys: Phys) {.
    inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Inserts the value and shifts the binary field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the binary field upward above where inserted. If it is in the water, shifts the binary field downward below where inserted. 
func keepValid(self: var XmmBinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Keeps only the valid area.

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field with only the given column.

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field with only the given row.

    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field with only the air area. 
func keptValid(self: XmmBinaryField): XmmBinaryField {.inline, noinit,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field with only the valid area.

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}

Replaces the column of the binary field by after. 
func rotate(self: var XmmBinaryField) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [],
                                        forbids: [].}
Rotates the binary field by 180 degrees. Ghost cells are cleared before the rotation.
